name: Offroad 6x6 Truck Driving Sim
description:
Deliver heavy cargo from one place to another. Drive to explore off-road environment and test your driving skills. If you want to became a truck driver and this is imposibble for some reason for you you have to try this game.

Features
-Steering wheel, buttons or tilting controls
-Wonderful sound
-Fanstanstic landscapes
-HD graphics
-Smooth and easy controls
